resources.string: sponsor banner; click to visit sponsor home page
connect to Psiphon; click to connect
If you have any specific comments, further information about web sites that do not work, or if this form is not working for you, please email feedback@psiphon.ca.
Thank you for submitting your feedback
Invalid URL Parameters in feedback form submission
Failed to get feedback page content
Psiphon\'s VPN has been disconnected by you or by another app. Multiple VPN apps cannot be running at the same time. Check if another VPN app is installed and is running.
Psiphon cannot start the VPN. Multiple VPN apps cannot be running at the same time. Check if another VPN app is installed and is set to Always-on.

The whole device tunnel option is available for your device.

With this option, all of your Internet traffic for all apps including all browsers will be tunneled through Psiphon.

Alternatively, you can choose to tunnel only the bundled Psiphon browser which will leave all other apps going directly through your standard Internet connection.
Selected region is currently not available, please select another region.
We care about your privacy and data security. We keep this app free by showing ads.
Can we continue to use your data to tailor ads for you?
You can change your choice anytime for Psiphon Pro in the app options. Our ad providers will collect data and use a unique identifier on your device to show you ads.
